oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tomorrow's Generation
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Finding Community
Schools
African American universities and colleges; Fisk University (Nashville, Tenn.); African American college students
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Students walking into doorway with steeple in background.

A group of young men and women in overcoats carrying books walking into Fisk University's Cravath Library entrance, with Fisk University Chapel in background. Fisk University's iconic campus buildings are featured as an example of excellence in college architecture in a fundraising campaign publication for the United Negro College Fund.
